com.example.sextoncalculator
Class FoodData

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.example.sextoncalculator.FoodData

public class FoodData
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

FoodData creates a database used to store food item information. It also provides methods to perform queries on the database.

Author:
Tsuehue Xiong, Adam Bachmeier, Johnathan Ly, Justin Springer
